alert.note: Alert for Callaway; Cole; Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 9:44PM CDT until August 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cole County in central Missouri... Southwestern Callaway County in central Missouri... Central Osage County in central Missouri... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 944 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Columbia Regional Airport to Jefferson City to Brazito, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, Fulton, Holts Summit, Wardsville, Taos, New Bloomfield, Westphalia, Lake Mykee Town, Brazito, Lake Mykee, Mokane, Wainwright, Schubert, Osage City, Osage Bend, Carrington, Frankenstein, Tebbetts, Guthrie, and Steedman. This also includes Clarks Hill/Norton Historic Site and Jefferson Landing Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
